statements: SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, equipment_id, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT maintenance_date, equipment_id, maintenance_notes, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id > 2 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_notes LIKE '%inspection%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-06-01' AND maintenance_type LIKE '%Repair%';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_notes IS NOT NULL ORDER BY equipment_id ASC, maintenance_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, performed_by FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT schedule_id, scheduled_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 100 ORDER BY maintenance_type ASC, scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01' AND maintenance_type LIKE '%cleaning%';
SELECT MAX(schedule_id) AS max_schedule_id FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE performed_by = 'John Doe';
SELECT maintenance_type, COUNT(*) AS total_scheduled FROM MaintenanceSchedule GROUP BY maintenance_type ORDER BY total_scheduled DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM EquipmentInfo;
SELECT equipment_id, log_description, log_date FROM EquipmentLog;
SELECT schedule_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM EquipmentInfo JOIN EquipmentLog ON EquipmentInfo.equipment_id = EquipmentLog.equipment_id WHERE EquipmentLog.log_date >= '2022-01-01' AND EquipmentLog.log_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM EquipmentInfo WHERE equipment_type = 'HVAC' ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Maintenance_Count, equipment_type FROM EquipmentInfo JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ON EquipmentInfo.equipment_id = MaintenanceSchedule.equipment_id GROUP BY equipment_type ORDER BY Total_Maintenance_Count DESC
SELECT MAX(last_maintenance_date) AS Latest_Maintenance_Date, equipment_name FROM EquipmentInfo GROUP BY equipment_name ORDER BY Latest_Maintenance_Date DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Plumbing';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Building A' AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, location, system_type FROM irrigation_system WHERE water_source = 'Well' ORDER BY system_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE location='Farm A';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_log ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_type, maintenance_duration FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM equipment JOIN maintenance_log ON equipment.equipment_id = maintenance_log.equipment_id WHERE equipment_type='Tractor';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Repair' AND technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT system_name, location FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLogs ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;

SELECT equipment_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM MaintenanceLogs JOIN Equipment ON MaintenanceLogs.equipment_id = Equipment.equipment_id WHERE MaintenanceLogs.maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
SELECT system_id, system_name, location FROM IrrigationSystem WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
